duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform calibration of pressure, temperature, and flow sensors; assemble, install, and test electrical equipment; ensure proper wiring connections and fixture installation.
Follow plant procedures for documenting calibration activities; troubleshoot control valves, positioners, and I/P transducers; read instrument vendor manuals for unfamiliar devices.
Adhere to safety practices; operate equipment such as forklift and man lift; prepare work site for repairs; maintain knowledge of safety protocols and OSHA regulations.
